subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer set a course record in the opening round of the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic, and Annika Sorenstam set the L.P.G.A. mark in the second round of the 2001 Standard Register Ping.
snippet: Paula Creamer set a course record in the opening round of the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic, and Annika Sorenstam set the L.P.G.A. mark in the second round of the 2001 Standard Register Ping.
